description: React functional component TodoItem that renders a single todo item with functionalities to toggle completion, inline editing of the todo text, and deletion. It manages editing state locally and calls provided callbacks for updating the parent state.

methods.name: TodoItem({ todo, onToggle, onDelete, onUpdate })
methods.description: React functional component that displays a todo item with editing, toggling, and deleting capabilities.

methods.name: startEdit
methods.description: Initiates editing mode, resets draft to current todo text.

methods.name: cancelEdit
methods.description: Exits editing mode without saving changes.

methods.name: saveEdit
methods.description: Saves the changes to the todo text if input is valid and different from previous.

methods.name: handleKey
methods.description: Handles key press events in the input while editing, triggering save on Enter and cancel on Escape.

ctags.name: TodoItem
ctags.pattern: /^export default function TodoItem({ todo, onToggle, onDelete, onUpdate }) {$/

ctags.name: todo
ctags.pattern: /^        aria-label={todo.completed ? 'Mark as not completed' : 'Mark as completed'}$/

fields.name: aria-label={todo.completed ? 'Mark as not completed' : 'Mark as completed'}
